item.title: A Simple Biological Circuit Simulator
item.description: In a few months time, I’m very excited to be embarking on a PhD in Interdisciplinary Biosciences. Since I trained as a phycisist, I’m keenly aware of the amount of stuff I don’t know, keenely unaware of the stuff I don’t know I don’t know, and trying to avoid the wonderful physics tradition of deceiving myself that I know what I in fact don’t know about any field that isn’t physics or pure maths.
